{{Short description|none}} {{Discrimination sidebar}} In the [[Western world]] or in non-[[Asia]]n countries, terms such as "'''racism against Asians'''" or "'''anti-Asian racism'''" are typically used in reference to [[Racism|racist]] policies, [[discrimination]] against, and mistreatment of [[Asian people]] and Asian immigrants by institutions and/or non-Asian people.<ref>{{cite journal |last1=Zheng |first1=Lily |title=To Dismantle Anti-Asian Racism, We Must Understand Its Roots |url=https://hbr.org/2021/05/to-dismantle-anti-asian-racism-we-must-understand-its-roots |journal=Harvard Business Review |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20210601160247/https://hbr.org/2021/05/to-dismantle-anti-asian-racism-we-must-understand-its-roots |archive-date=1 June 2021 |date=27 May 2021}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |last1=Lee |first1=Jennifer |title=Confronting the invisibility of anti-Asian racism |url=https://www.brookings.edu/blog/how-we-rise/2022/05/18/confronting-the-invisibility-of-anti-asian-racism/ |website=Brookings |access-date=1 March 2023 |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20220518172056/https://www.brookings.edu/blog/how-we-rise/2022/05/18/confronting-the-invisibility-of-anti-asian-racism/ |archive-date=18 May 2022 |date=18 May 2022}}</ref>
== Overview == The concept of 'racism against Asians' is most common in communities or countries where the ethnic or racial majority is non-Asian, or it is most common in communities or countries where the national character is [[Western world|Western]]. The concept is most frequently employed in reference to Anti-Asian phenomena which exist in countries which are located outside the Asian continent, such as countries which are located in [[Africa]], [[Europe]], [[North America]] and [[South America]].
